Your space with all the data that you need

Everything that you need is in one place now. With "My Investor Journal" you don't have to worry about organizing your investments in more than one place anymore.

  • create potfolios and set allocations
  • view your investments in pie charts
  • create & update your IPS (Investor Policy Statement) and many more

Investing is "a must"

Add personal notes to your investments

This is the place of your journal where you can add notes for the investments that you make.

Why Taking Notes?

  • to be able to look back in time and see why or how you made some investments for your portfolio.
  • if you want to leave your portfolio to someone else, that person can look at the notes and have a clear picture of the investments.
Investing is healthy

A brief look at your investments from your Calendar

Access your Calendar from the Dashboard and take a look at every month / year to quickly see when and what investments you have made.

I'm interested

Have any questions?

Frequently Asked Questions

What is My Investor Journal?

My Investor Journal provides you with a set of tools and an interface where you can journal your activity as a long-term investor. This is your space where you can add your personal notes for an investment and where you can create & modify your IPS based on the current stage of your life. This is the place the people who are dear to you and for which you will leave your portfolio as a legacy will have access so they can understand your mindset and continue to grow your portfolio. This is the space that will help you to stay disciplined.

What not to expect from My Investor Journal?

We do not predict if your investments will go up or down if you buy 'X' or you buy 'Y'. We are not telling you how your investments are performing. We do not track your portfolio wealth: how much money you made in the last 30 days, or in the last 6 months, or what is your overall profit. You can't buy stocks or any other form of investment from My Investor Journal.
